column5: I,ll keep this simple and to the point.  There,s a saying,fight it out and you,ll be good friends after.  Well,this is so true.  My oldest had an issue with a fellow student many years ago..Ya know,king of the school yard crap.  They had it out,one on one.  After that,they became great friends.Both made their way up the hockey grounds I got to know him as TL.  When I heard his name in a sled crash and found DATS,,it floored me.  So young at 30 YOA.  REST IN PIECE TL    LIFE IS PRECIOUS and can be taken away so fast.
Hear ya Brian.  We're not supposed to lose the youngun's

Hear ya Brian.  We're not supposed to lose the youngun's   Simon,I made more friends trading knuckles Although there were other ways,but some of us took the road to HARD KNOCKS.LOL  Last name didnt help. but it was my name.     At the end,,,   It turned out to be called RESPECT.
Sorry to hear that B.  R.I.P.  TL
Sad news Brian, that sorta thing is really tough.
I'm assuming that was hwy 26 this week?  Sorry to hear about this Brian.
Sorry to hear this Brian, tough with they are that young.  My condolences.
